question.body: Which of these lists includes all of the veins that deliver blood to the right heart.

multiple_choice.choice: inferior vena cava, superior vena cava, coronary sinus
right superior pulmonary vein, right inferior pulmonary vein, inferior vena cava, superior vena cava
right superior pulmonary vein, right inferior pulmonary vein, left superior pulmonary vein, left inferior pulmonary vein
coronary sinus and superior vena cava

response.feedback: Correct. These are the 3 veins that deliver blood to the right atrium.
Incorrect. Although the venae cavae vessels deliver blood to the right heart, the pulmnonary veins deliver blood to the left heart.
Incorrect. All of these vessels deliver blood to the left heart.
Incorrect. These are two of the three vessels that deliver blood to the right heart.

part.hint: There are seven veins that return blood to the heart, but not all seven deliver blood to the right heart.
